00036 #ifndef _WX_MD5_H_
00037 #define _WX_MD5_H_
00038 
00039 // wxWidgets headers
00040 #include "wx/webupdatedef.h"            // for the WXDLLIMPEXP_WEBUPDATE macro
00041 #include "wx/string.h"
00042 #include "wx/wfstream.h"
00043 
00044 
00045 
00046 // 
00047 // MD5 from RSA
00048 // ------------
00049 
00050 #define MD5_HASHBYTES 16
00051 
00052 typedef struct MD5Context {
00053         unsigned int buf[4];
00054         unsigned int bits[2];
00055         unsigned char in[64];
00056 } MD5_CTX;
00057 
00058 void   MD5Init(MD5_CTX *context);
00059 void   MD5Update(MD5_CTX *context, unsigned char const *buf, unsigned len);
00060 void   MD5Final(unsigned char digest[MD5_HASHBYTES], MD5_CTX *context);
00061 void   MD5Transform(unsigned int buf[4], unsigned int const in[16]);
00062 char * MD5End(MD5_CTX *, char *);
00063 
00064 
00065 
00067 class wxMD5
00068 {
00069 public:
00070         wxMD5() {}
00071         virtual ~wxMD5() {}
00072 
00073 public:
00074 
00076         static wxString GetFileMD5(wxInputStream &str);
00077         static wxString GetFileMD5(const wxString &filename);
00078 
00080         static wxString GetMD5(const wxString &str);
00081 };
00082 
00083 #endif          // _WX_MD5_H_
